wisdom_brain.apps.swagger_docs.schemas module¶

class wisdom_brain.apps.swagger_docs.schemas.CustomAutoSchema(manual_fields=None)[source]¶

Bases: rest_framework.schemas.inspectors.AutoSchema

get_link(path, method, base_url)[source]¶

Generate coreapi.Link for self.view, path and method.

This is the main _public_ access point.

Parameters:

  • path: Route path for view from URLConf.

  • method: The HTTP request method.

  • base_url: The project “mount point” as given to SchemaGenerator
